results.title: Metformin as a Therapeutic Target in Endometrial Cancers
results.text_hl: Many studies suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ shows potential as an adjuvant treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Uterine_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014594 @@@uterine and other cancers@@@.
